languages.text: "Как только наследник Лорд-капитана вступит в свои законные права, я немеделенно уведомлю нового Вольного Торговца о нашем контракте. Возможно, придется подождать пару лет — передача Патента дело... деликатное".

traits.locale_text: "Как только наследник Лорд-капитана вступит в свои законные права, я немеделенно уведомлю нового Вольного Торговца о нашем контракте. Возможно, придется подождать пару лет — передача Патента дело... деликатное".
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "As soon as the Lord Captain's heir claims their rightful title, I will immediately notify the new Rogue Trader of our agreement. You may have to wait for a few years, the transfer of the Warrant is... a rather delicate affair."
languages.original_text: "Как только наследник Лорд-капитана вступит в свои законные права, я немеделенно уведомлю нового Вольного Торговца о нашем контракте. Возможно, придется подождать пару лет — передача Патента дело... деликатное".

traits.speaker: Player

traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: « Dès que l'héritier légitime du seigneur-capitaine aura pris officiellement possession de son titre, j'informerai immédiatement le nouveau libre-marchand de notre accord. Vous devrez sans doute attendre plusieurs années, je crains que le transfert d'une lettre de marque soit un processus des plus... délicat. »
languages.original_text: "As soon as the Lord Captain's heir claims their rightful title, I will immediately notify the new Rogue Trader of our agreement. You may have to wait for a few years, the transfer of the Warrant is... a rather delicate affair."

traits.locale_text: « Dès que l'héritier légitime du seigneur-capitaine aura pris officiellement possession de son titre, j'informerai immédiatement le nouveau libre-marchand de notre accord. Vous devrez sans doute attendre plusieurs années, je crains que le transfert d'une lettre de marque soit un processus des plus... délicat. »
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: “等到舰长大人的继承人取得合法头衔之后，我会立即通知新任行商浪人履行我们之间的协议。您可能需要等上几年，因为行商浪人授状的转让……是件相当棘手的事情。”
languages.original_text: "As soon as the Lord Captain's heir claims their rightful title, I will immediately notify the new Rogue Trader of our agreement. You may have to wait for a few years, the transfer of the Warrant is... a rather delicate affair."

traits.locale_text: “等到舰长大人的继承人取得合法头衔之后，我会立即通知新任行商浪人履行我们之间的协议。您可能需要等上几年，因为行商浪人许可证的转让……是件相当棘手的事情。”
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Sobald der Erbe des Lord Captains seinen rechtmäßigen Titel beansprucht, werde ich den Freihändler unverzüglich über unsere Vereinbarung in Kenntnis setzen. Ihr müsst möglicherweise einige Jahre warten, die Übertragung des Handelsbriefs ist ... eine delikate Angelegenheit."
languages.original_text: "As soon as the Lord Captain's heir claims their rightful title, I will immediately notify the new Rogue Trader of our agreement. You may have to wait for a few years, the transfer of the Warrant is... a rather delicate affair."

traits.locale_text: "Sobald der Erbe des Lord Captains seinen rechtmäßigen Titel beansprucht, werde ich den Freihändler unverzüglich über unsere Vereinbarung in Kenntnis setzen. Ihr müsst möglicherweise einige Jahre warten, die Übertragung des Handelsbriefs ist ... eine delikate Angelegenheit."
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: «Tan pronto como el heredero del Lord Capitán reclame su título, notificaré de inmediato al nuevo Comerciante Independiente de nuestro acuerdo. Es posible que deba esperar unos años, la transferencia de la Patente es... un asunto bastante delicado».
languages.original_text: "As soon as the Lord Captain's heir claims their rightful title, I will immediately notify the new Rogue Trader of our agreement. You may have to wait for a few years, the transfer of the Warrant is... a rather delicate affair."

traits.locale_text: «Tan pronto como el heredero del Lord Capitán reclame su título, notificaré de inmediato al nuevo Comerciante Independiente de nuestro acuerdo. Es posible que deba esperar unos años, la transferencia de la Patente es... un asunto bastante delicado».
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンの後継者が正当な称号を受け継ぐと、私は直ちに新しい自由開拓者に契約内容を通知する。おそらく数年かかるだろう。令状の移譲は…かなり繊細な問題なのだ」
languages.original_text: "As soon as the Lord Captain's heir claims their rightful title, I will immediately notify the new Rogue Trader of our agreement. You may have to wait for a few years, the transfer of the Warrant is... a rather delicate affair."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンの後継者が正当な称号を受け継ぐと、私は直ちに新しい自由開拓者に契約内容を通知する。おそらく数年かかるだろう。令状の移譲は…かなり繊細な問題なのだ」
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan'ın vârisi tahta çıktığında anlaşmamızı yeni Hür Tacir'e derhâl aktaracağım. Birkaç yıl beklemeniz gerekebilir... Ruhsatname'nin taşınması, hayli titizlik gerektiren bir iş."
languages.original_text: "As soon as the Lord Captain's heir claims their rightful title, I will immediately notify the new Rogue Trader of our agreement. You may have to wait for a few years, the transfer of the Warrant is... a rather delicate affair."
